title: Trump fires Secretary of State Rex Tillerson
text:
Trump fires Secretary of State Rex Tillerson 1:32pm GMT - 01:06 
U.S. President Donald Trump announced on Twitter that he had replaced Secretary of State Rex Tillerson with Central Intelligence Agency Director Mike Pompeo, ousting the embattled top diplomat after a series of public rifts. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. President Donald Trump announced on Twitter that he had replaced Secretary of State Rex Tillerson with Central Intelligence Agency Director Mike Pompeo, ousting the embattled top diplomat after a series of public rifts.
